channel.title: Index on SGP 2023 - Symposium on Geometry Processing 2023
channel.description: Recent content in Index on SGP 2023 - Symposium on Geometry Processing 2023

item.title: Awards
Submit
item.description: Call For Technical Papers We invite submissions related to, but not limited to, the following topics: Acquisition and reconstruction Analysis and fabrication for 3D printing Architectural geometry Discrete differential geometry Exploration of shape collections Geometry and topology representations Geometry compression Geometric deep learning Geometry processing applications Interactive techniques Meshing and remeshing Multiresolution modeling Multimodal shape processing Processing of massive geometric datasets Geometric representations for machine learning Shape analysis and synthesis Simulation and animation Smoothing, filtering, and denoising Surface and volume parameterization and deformation Dataset Papers.
